entry.title: Honey with Pistachio
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 1350.00 - 1620.00 (2 variants)

Honey with Pistachio is a delicious and nutritious spread made with honey and ground pistachios. It has a sweet and nutty flavor and a smooth, creamy texture. Honey with pistachio can be enjoyed on its own, or it can be used to top toast, pancakes, waffles, and other baked goods. It can also be used in smoothies, yogurt parfaits, and ice cream sundaes.

Quick Facts:

  • Honey with pistachio offers a rich source of protein, fiber, and healthy fats.
  • Pistachios provide essential nutrients like vitamin E, magnesium, and copper.
  • Honey is abundant in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds, contributing to its health benefits.

How to Use:

Honey with pistachio can be enjoyed in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Spread it on toast, pancakes, or waffles for a delicious and nutritious breakfast.
  • Top your yogurt parfait with honey with pistachio for a sweet and nutty treat.
  • Add it to your smoothie for a boost of protein and healthy fats.
  • Drizzle it over ice cream for a decadent dessert.
  • Use it in baking to add flavor and moisture to your baked goods.

Here are a few specific recipes that you can try:

  • Honey Pistachio Smoothie: Combine 1 cup milk, 1/2 cup yogurt, 1/4 cup honey, 1/4 cup ground pistachios, and 1 banana in a blender. Blend until smooth and enjoy.
  • Honey Pistachio Yogurt Parfait: Layer yogurt, honey with pistachio, and granola in a glass or jar. Repeat layers until the glass or jar is full. Top with fresh fruit and enjoy.
  • Honey Pistachio Ice Cream Sundae: Scoop your favorite ice cream into a bowl. Drizzle with honey with pistachios and top with chopped pistachios. Enjoy!

entry.title: Honey PR Box
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 5265.00

Beri (Sidr) Honey: Â 


Description: Dive into the divine nectar of Beri Honey, collected by bees from the blossoms of Sidr trees in the mountainous regions of Pakistan. This exquisite honey, with its 100% organic origins, delights with its reddish-brown hue, velvety texture, and sweet, fruity notes.1

Quick Facts: Beri Honey is your ally in allergy defense, soothing elixirs, digestion, weight management, skin health, blood sugar balance, antioxidant abundance, heart wellness, and nature's sweet sweetness.

How to Use: Drizzle it over juices, smoothies, teas, and coffees for natural sweetness. Elevate your culinary creations by substituting honey for sugar. For skincare, blend it with cinnamon for an acne-fighting mask or with lemon juice to fade dark spots.


Mix Nuts In Beri Honey:


Description: Mixing nuts in Beri Honey brings a delicious and nutritious fusion of textures and health benefits. Nuts contribute protein, fiber, healthy fats, and essential vitamins and minerals, while Beri Honey adds sweetness and antioxidants.

Quick Facts: Nuts like almonds, walnuts, cashews, peanuts, and pecans meet Beri Honey's antioxidants and anti-inflammatory properties to boost heart health, energy levels, immune defenses, and cellular protection.

How to Use: Create a trail mix, top your yogurt, enhance smoothies, or use it as a spread for a delightful, energy-boosting treat.


Honey With Saffron:


Description: Nutria Fresh's Honey With Saffron is an all-natural product made from raw organic honey infused with high-quality Saffron (Super Negin A+ European Grade). This fusion offers benefits like reduced skin issues, detoxification, and support for muscle and joint health.

Benefits: This combination detoxifies the blood, reduces cholesterol, and alleviates muscle weakness, joint, and back pains. For added benefits, mix one tablespoon in warm water in the morning or warm milk at bedtime.

How to Use: Enjoy one tablespoon of Honey With Saffron in a glass of warm milk for a wholesome wellness experience.


Salajeet (Shilajit):


Description: Salajeet, also known as Shilajit, is a natural substance formed over centuries by the gradual decomposition of organic matter in the Himalayan rocks. It's a sticky, dark brown or black substance with various potential health benefits.

Quick Facts: Salajeet offers improved energy levels, reduced inflammation, enhanced cognitive function, boosted immune system, improved heart health, increased testosterone levels (for men), improved fertility (for men), and boosted sexual performance (for men and women).

How to Use: Mix Shilajit powder with warm milk or water, take Shilajit capsules with food, add Shilajit liquid to smoothies or juices, or apply it topically to reduce inflammation and promote wound healing.


Saffron:


Description: Saffron is a precious spice derived from the saffron crocus flower and is known for its vibrant red color, intense aroma, and slightly bitter taste. It's a valuable addition to culinary and beverage delights.

Quick Facts: Saffron offers improved mood, enhanced cognitive function, reduced inflammation, improved heart health, and antioxidant protection.

How to Use: Infuse your dishes with its unique flavor, elevate your beverages, or consider saffron threads as a dietary supplement.

entry.title: Sidr (Beri) Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 450.00 - 3015.00 (4 variants)

Beri Honey is a divine nectar gathered by bees from the blossoms of the Sidr tree in the mountainous regions of Pakistan. This honey is celebrated for its exquisite taste and unique origin. The Sidr tree, found in the wild, blesses us with honey that's 100% organic, showcasing a reddish-brown hue and a lush, velvety texture. Its flavor is a sweet revelation, carrying fruity notes that dance on the palate.

Quick FactsÂ 

  • Allergy Defense
  • Soothing Elixir
  • Digestive Companion
  • Weight Management
  • Healing Touch
  • Skin's Delight
  • Blood Sugar Harmony
  • Antioxidant Bounty
  • Heart Health
  • Nature's Sweetness

How to Use Sidr Honey

Beri (Sidr) Honey is a versatile companion in your daily life:

  • Add 1-2 teaspoons of honey to your juices, smoothies, teas, and coffees as a natural sweetener.
  • Enhance your culinary creations by substituting honey for sugar in recipes.
  • For skincare, create a mask by mixing 3 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of cinnamon to combat acne. Apply to your face, leave for 15 minutes, and rinse with lukewarm water.
  • To fade dark spots, blend 2 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of lemon juice, and apply the mixture as a mask for 20-30 minutes.

entry.title: Robinia Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 522.00 - 2340.00 (4 variants)

Robinia Honey, derived from the blossoms of the Black Locust tree in the Chitral and Gilgit-Baltistan regions of Pakistan, is a treasure waiting to grace your palate. This exquisite honey embodies a delicate, lively, and elegant taste, much like a gentle breeze on a sunlit day. It boasts a light to clear color and enchants with its soft, floral notes, leaving your taste buds with a lingering sweetness and hints of vanilla.

Taste and Color:

A dance of flavors awaits your palate as you savor Robinia Honey. It unveils a very thin, delicate, and elegant profile, akin to a gentle breath of wind. With its light-colored, almost clear appearance, this honey delivers a soft and exquisite floral taste that leaves your senses enchanted. A mere taste unveils a tender sweetness, while a subtle, lingering flavor of sweet florals with hints of vanilla graces your mouth.

Quick FactsÂ 

  • Antiseptic Marvel
  • Antioxidant-Rich
  • Allergy-Friendly
  • Slow Crystallization
  • Healthy Sweetening
  • Stress Relief
  • Healing Touch

How to Use:

  • As a Natural Sweetener: Add 1-2 teaspoons of Robinia honey to your beverages like teas, coffees, and smoothies.
  • In Culinary Delights: Replace sugar with Robinia honey in your cooking and baking endeavors, following your recipes.
  • For Skin Nourishment: Create a face mask by mixing 2 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of lemon juice. Apply it to your skin for 20-30 minutes to reduce dark spots and enhance skin quality.
  • Stomach Soother: A spoonful of Robinia honey on an empty stomach, 20-30 minutes before a meal, can help calm stomach inflammation and assist with digestive conditions.

Throat Comfort: In cases of sore throats, Robinia honey can be a soothing and bacterial-fighting remedy, helping to alleviate irritation and reduce cough.

This honey variety offers a delightful addition to your favorite beverages, a luscious drizzle over granola, or a heavenly spread on warm toast. Close your eyes and savor the essence of an enchanting citrus grove nestled in the serene foothills of the Upper Regions of Punjab, where diligent beekeepers ensure their honeybees exclusively gather nectar from the delicate blossoms of orange and tangerine trees.

It's not just a sweetener; it's a flavorful journey to the fragrant citrus groves of Punjab. With its numerous health attributes and versatile uses, this honey variety delights both the palate and the body.Â

  2. Heart Health
  3. Wound Healing

  5. Rich in Antioxidants
  6. Blood Pressure Support
  7. Cholesterol Improvement

How to use:

  • For your favorite beverages like juices, smoothies, teas, and coffees, simply mix 1-2 teaspoons of Orange Blossom Honey as a natural sweetener.
  • For those with acne-prone skin, concoct a honey-cinnamon mask by blending 3 teaspoons of honey and half a teaspoon of cinnamon. Apply this soothing mask to your face, leave it on for 15 minutes, and rinse with lukewarm water.
  • Bid bye to dark spots by preparing a skin-clarifying mask. Combine 2 teaspoons of honey with half a teaspoon of lemon juice, apply the mixture as a mask for 20-30 minutes, and unveil radiant results.

entry.title: Mix nuts in Beri Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 900.00 - 1350.00 (2 variants)

Mixing nuts in beri honey is a delicious and nutritious way to enjoy both ingredients. The nuts add a crunchy texture and protein boost, while the beri honey adds sweetness and antioxidants.

Quick Facts:

  • Nuts: Protein, fiber, healthy fats, vitamins, and minerals.
  • Common nuts: Almonds, walnuts, cashews, peanuts, pecans.
  • Beri honey: Rich in antioxidants and anti-inflammatory compounds.
  • Nuts in Beri honey: Boost heart health, energy, immune system, and cellular protection.

How to Use:

You can mix nuts in beri honey in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Trail mix: Combine your favorite nuts, such as almonds, walnuts, and pecans, with beri honey. Add dried fruit and seeds for extra flavor and nutrients.
  • Yogurt topping: Top your yogurt with a handful of nuts and a drizzle of beri honey. This is a quick and easy breakfast or snack.
  • Smoothie addition: Add a handful of nuts to your smoothie for a boost of protein and healthy fats. Beri honey can also be added to smoothies for sweetness and antioxidants.
  • Sandwich spread: Spread nut butter on a slice of bread and top with beri honey and sliced bananas. This is a delicious and satisfying snack or meal.

No matter how you choose to use it, mixing nuts in beri honey is a delicious and nutritious way to improve your health.

Here are a few additional tips for using nuts in beri honey:

  • Store your mixed nuts in beri honey in an airtight container in the refrigerator. This will help to keep them fresh and prevent them from becoming rancid.
  • You can also add other ingredients to your mixed nuts and beri honey, such as dried fruit, seeds, or spices. Get creative and experiment with different flavors and combinations to find what you like best.
  • Enjoy your mixed nuts in beri honey as a snack, breakfast, or meal. It's a great way to get a boost of energy, protein, and healthy fats.

entry.title: Acacia Honey
entry.summary:
Vendor: Nutria Fresh
Type:
Price: 585.00 - 1350.00 (4 variants)

Acacia honey is a type of honey that is made from the nectar of the acacia tree. It is a light-colored honey with a mild, sweet flavor. Acacia honey is known for its high fructose content, which makes it slow to crystallize. It is also less likely to cause allergies than other types of honey.

Quick Facts:

Some of the potential health benefits of acacia honey include:

  • Improved wound healing: Acacia honey has been shown to promote wound healing. It can help to reduce inflammation, fight infection, and speed up the growth of new tissue.
  • Cough relief: Acacia honey is effective in relieving coughs. It can soothe the throat and suppress the urge to cough.
  • Reduced risk of heart disease: Acacia honey can help to lower cholesterol levels and improve blood sugar control. These factors can reduce the risk of heart disease.
  • Boosted immune system: Acacia honey is a good source of antioxidants, which can help to boost the immune system.

How to Use

Acacia honey can be used in a variety of ways. Here are a few ideas:

  • Add it to tea or coffee: Add a teaspoon of acacia honey to your morning cup of tea or coffee for a sweet and healthy boost.
  • Use it as a marinade: Acacia honey can be used as a marinade for chicken, fish, or vegetables. It adds a unique flavor and helps to tenderize the meat.
  • Add it to yogurt: Top your yogurt with a drizzle of acacia honey for a delicious and nutritious snack.
  • Use it as a topping for pancakes or waffles: Acacia honey is a delicious and healthy topping for pancakes or waffles.
  • Add it to baked goods: Acacia honey can be used to add flavor and moisture to baked goods, such as muffins, cookies, and cakes.
  • Eat it on its own: Acacia honey can be eaten on its own as a snack or dessert. It is also a good way to sweeten drinks and food without adding refined sugar.

Acacia honey is a delicious and versatile ingredient that can be used in a variety of ways. It is also a good source of nutrients and has several potential health benefits.
